bugs.summary: Add a profiler marker that exposes jitter in video frame timestamps

Add vsync output time to VsyncEvent
Simplify FinalizationRegistry implementation by separating JS interface from implementation of callback queue
Emit warning to console when rejecting to set cookie (from cross-site/foreign domain)
Can't zoom Bing Maps using trackpad scroll gesture with apz.windows.use_direct_manipulation = true
Use nimbus-shared repo for schema validation

task generation performance has significantly regressed
staged upgrade uninstalls addon, resulting in data loss
